title: Tomato, Basil, and Gouda Cheese Fondue
directions: Place Gouda cheese in a microwave-safe bowl; heat on high for 1 minute. Stir cheese and continue cooking in 30-second intervals until cheese is melted, 1 to 2 minutes.
Stir tomato and basil into melted cheese. Serve fondue with baguette slices.
ingredients: 8 ounces Gouda cheese, cut into 1-inch cubes
